column5: Got this in my FB feed this morning. http://www.lowrance.com/en-US/News/SpotlightScan-Sonar/
I want it for ice fishing
getting a login screen prompt with link
Right on.  I wonder what the max water depth is?
Cool.  Now I just need a boat to put in on.  http://youtu.be/zwEVvtveVJA
I want it for ice fishing   You want everything new for crips sake.LOL   Looks cool,when ya buying one Dave? LOL
Very neat, but to me electronics this advanced take something away from the enjoyment of fishing.
You want everything new for crips sake.LOL   Looks cool,when ya buying one Dave? LOL  After I build my cabin and then buy a new truck and then a new depthfinder.........
Oh I want that. Dang Gen2 only!
Looks cool. Cable steer only though. My lss1 works well with my terrova for now.
